title: How to do inclusive usability testing
description: Learn how to conduct usability studies with users who have a diverse range of access needs. In this new training course, you will learn how to conduct moderated usability studies using participants with a diverse range of access needs, remotely and lab-based.
prerequisites: Awareness of usability studies, accessibility and research
topics: How to be ensure people with diverse access needs are included
How to determine the number of participants
The accessibility of platforms used for studies, assistive technologies and browser requirements
How to moderate usability studies and capture insights
accessibility_support: A captioned recording with transcript will be shared with attendees after the live event
cost: Free or reduced fee for some
